question: When were the Sassi of Matera recognized as a UNESCO World Heritage Site?
asked_question_translated: Kedy boli Sassi v Matere uznané za svetové dedičstvo UNESCO?
answer: Sassi di Matera boli uznané za svetové dedičstvo UNESCO v roku 1993.
answer_translated_eng: Sassi di Matera was recognized as a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1993.
